metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4342 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in Cacti before 0.8.8d allows remote attackersto execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors involving a cdefid.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8d+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8d+ds1-1').
